html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-02682013-03-07,  ,  DFO,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Fishery (General) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FISHERY (GENERAL) REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that the At-Sea Fisheries Observer Program continues to be managed in an orderly and effective manner; (2) clarify that the requirement to transmit data collected by at-sea observers to the Department shall be done in a timely manner; and (3) ensure that at-sea observers can continue to perform biological examination and sampling of a fish by amending the Regulations to allow this function to be done on board a vessel.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0036 Publication Date: 2013-03-27
AttachmentsAttachment
